items.sentence: The tourist asked for lodging for the night.

That's the reason that I accepted the offer.
Mary told everybody that she was Tom's wife.
All of a sudden, the barn went up in flames.
On my way home, I came across an old friend.
Unless you hurry, you'll be late for school.
Last summer, I worked part time on the farm.
The athletic meet was postponed due to rain.
I did it without realizing what I was doing.
Everyone here except me has lived in Boston.
I'll call you as soon as I arrive in Boston.
I remember going to Boston when I was a kid.
People over the age of 18 are able to drive.
Did you see yesterday's total lunar eclipse?
In due time, Tom's innocence will be proven.
Choose the grammatically incorrect sentence.
We can do this the easy way or the hard way.
We don't have enough time to do it that way.
I have the feeling that I've met you before.
That's just the way things happen sometimes.
The road in front of Tom's house is unpaved.
Mary's mother is just as charming as she is.
I'm always leaving my umbrella on the train.
Tom said that he read three books last week.
Tom wasn't surprised when Mary quit her job.
Tom usually wears jeans and a white T-shirt.
Tom has read three books since this morning.
Tom walked up to the front door and knocked.
This is a list of things I need to do today.
There's something else I wanted to tell you.
Please let me know before you do that again.
Many people don't like going to the dentist.
Many people I didn't know were at the party.
It won't be hard to find someone to do that.
If you have any questions, ask your teacher.
I'm the only one who stayed awake all night.
I'd be very thankful if you did that for me.
I doubt that I'll have this job much longer.
How soon do you think we can reach our goal?
I'm very grateful to Tom for saving my life.
Tom took a deep breath and started speaking.
Were you the one who asked Tom to help Mary?
It seems Tom got offended by what Mary said.
Tom is convinced he's doing the right thing.
That must've happened while I was in Boston.
Tom said he wouldn't mind doing that for us.
Tom missed the bus he was planning to catch.
